EmailTemplate.name: MSF Confirm Access - CIQ
EmailTemplate.subject: [Case#{!Case.CaseNumber}] Access to Markit Securities Finance via S&P Global Market Intelligence Delivery Type(s) Indicated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear CIQ Team,
Please can you enable access for the below user(s) as follows:
User Information: Contact Name: Company Name: Company Address: Email Address: Telephone Number:
Region(s): - Europe by CIQ - North America by CIQ - Asia
Delivery Type: - Desktop/Web - ClariFi Xpressfeed
Customer Access Level: - Basic (1) - Advanced (2)
Access Type: - Trial Access Start Date: DD/MMM/YYYY End Date: DD/MMM/YYYY
- Purchase Access
Please can you confirm by replying to this email when this request has been processed?
Please do not hesitate to contact us if you require any further information.
Thank You.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFirstName} {!Case.OwnerLastName} Markit Securities Finance UK: +44 808 120 2344 | US: +1 866 861 6171 | HK: +852 800 964 146 msf-support@markit.com
{!Case.Thread_Id}
